alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 02 at 8:04PM CDT until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi. .Heavy rain Monday evening has pushed the Little Wabash River at Carmi above flood stage. The river will continue a slow rise this week into next weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 28.7 feet early Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
